short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn languages while browsing the web and watching YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
==============================
FEATURES

☆ Choose whether to translate words or sentences
☆ Choose the translation percentage
☆ Spread out translations across the whole page or concentrate on the top
☆ Ignore certain domains you don't want to translate
☆ Hover the translation to see the original text
☆ Import YouTube captions and subtitles for studying them later
☆ Hover YouTube subtitles or captions to see possible translations


==============================
PRIVACY

* The notice you see about having access to your history and website data is automatically generated because the extension runs on every tab. But it does NOT actually monitor your browsing history or your personal information.
